job.title: SENIOR AUTOMATION ENGINEER – Contractor (will work UK Hours)
job.description:
JOB TITLE: SENIOR AUTOMATION ENGINEER – Contractor
REPORTS TO: Lead Software Developer
LOCATION: Remote or Hybrid – Great Yarmouth Head Office - Can work full time UK Hours
 
Job Purpose:
This is a project role to review CADS’ existing test framework and translate our existing
StoreSpace AutoCAD and Website manual testing scripts into Playwright automated
testing scripts. Fully document and hand over to Test team to develop and maintain going
forward.

Project Objective:
 Reduce time spent each release running manual tests as well as the maintaining and updating the of the manual test scripts.

Current process:
 AutoCAD – 72 test cases with 12,865 steps – to be automated
 Website – 48 test cases with 5,320 steps – to be automated
 System wide – 7 test cases with 1,780 steps
 Services – 15 test cases with 1,875 steps

Project Scope
 Assess existing processes and recommend what can be achieved within a 1-month, 2-month and 3-month deadline.
 Identify test cases where automation will be most difficult to achieve and identify options.

Required Skills
 Experience in designing, developing and maintaining Automation Test programmes using Playwright
 Expert in using AutoCAD, creation of AutoCAD drawings and AutoCAD API
 Experience in using C#, VB.Net, WinForms, WPF
 Experience in DevOps (TFS) source control technology
 Experience of databases such as SQL

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled Senior Automation Engineer to join our team as a contractor for a duration of 1 to 3 months. The ideal candidate should have expertise in AutoCAD Civil 3D, VB.NET, C#, and NewSQL Database. 

As a Senior Automation Engineer, your main responsibility will be to develop and implement automated solutions for our engineering projects. You will work closely with our team to understand project requirements and design innovative solutions using your technical skills. 

To apply for this position, please submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project. We would like to know about your experience in similar projects, your approach to problem-solving, and any relevant certifications or qualifications you possess. Additionally, please include links to past completed projects that showcase your abilities in automation engineering.
